text: The Meadows Mall is a mall in Las Vegas, Nevada, USA. Its address is 4300 Meadows Lane. With 140 stores inside, the mall building is two stories high.Meadows Mall: Las Vegas RetailGuide Mall Profile Within the mall is a food court, and four department stores: Dillard's, Sears, JCPenney, and Macy's. The mall is slightly larger than Boulevard Mall, which contains 149 stores. ==References== Category:Malls Category:Las Vegas
title: Meadows Mall
